attributes.action: Referendum on Net Zero Target and the Green Agenda
attributes.additional_details: We need to take action now to avoid wrecking our way of life before it go's too far and irreversible.
attributes.background: We need to start hearing opinions on the other side of Climate Change, we should have a Vote on the whole thing to see if the public even supports the Actions of our Government on Climate Change once they have heard the real evidence and the Cost / Benefit analysis.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599602

If you wanted to start a petition requesting something different, you'd need to provide your full name.
